import React, { useState } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import Navbar from '../components/navbar' import Sidemenu from '../components/sidemenu' import Carousel from '../components/carousel' import MovieList from '../components/movielist' import Footer from '../components/footer' import {getMovies} from '../components/moviedb' const Home = () => { const [movies, setmovies] = useState([]) const Moviedata = getMovies() || [] return (
Home
); } export default Home
